t: Steve Earle - Townes - Amazon.com Music
J.T.: CDs & Vinyl - Steve Earle
s: For a father and a half to bury ... him on vinyl must have been heartbreaking. Rest in peace Justin Townes ... W. S. Walcott ... This is a sweet idea, that JT Earl’s dad would record his son’s songs and give JT’s daughter all profits from the album. I honestly bought it to support JT’s daughter, his music meant a lot to me and his death is a tragic blow to quality Americana, though I’ve never loved Steve ...

t: Steve Earle
s: Steve Earle's live album, 'Alone Again (Live)', was released on July 12th and is available to stream now. The 15-song record features live recordings from Earle's recent 2023 tour and includes hits "I Ain't Ever Satisfied", "The Galway Girl", "Copperhead Road" and more.

t: EARLE,STEVE / MCCOURY,DEL BAND - The Mountain [Vinyl] - Amazon.com Music
s: Iris Dement is perfect; her duet with Earle on "I'm Still In Love With You" is achingly sweet. Emmylou Harris appears here and there--I think there is some law that says Emmylou Harris must sing backup on every bluegrass record now--and a whole host of country singers join in the chorus of "Pilgrim." But this is Steve ...
